attrs.name: transition
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the animation effect. The default value is true. ; Animation style class name. ; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is panel.

attrs.name: expand
attrs.desc: Whether to expand the content area by default during initialization. The default value is true, and the default value is false. ; Whether to expand the content area by default during initialization. The default value is true, and the default value is false. ; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: foot
attrs.desc: Specify the bottom content. You can enter i18n content. ; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is --

attrs.name: head
attrs.desc: Specify the header content. You can enter the i18n content. ; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is --

attrs.name: isToggle
attrs.desc:
Indicates whether the scale-in mode can be used. The default value is true. 
; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: iconOpen
attrs.desc: Icon when expanded, providing the style class name of icon-font. ; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is icon-chevron-right

attrs.name: iconClose
attrs.desc: Icon during collapse, providing the style class name of icon-font; The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is icon-chevron-down

events.name: beforeExpand
events.desc: Event before expansion. Return false can prevent expansion.
